row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DMTOOL.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :SET &RUNID# = SYS_ACT_TOP_NR()
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CUSTOMIZE_BASEPATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_CUSTOMIZE_BASEPATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_SET_ENCODING_CMD# = "" :IF &UC4RB_XML_ENCODING# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SET_ENCODING_CMD# = "-Dfile.encoding=&UC4RB_XML_ENCODING#" :ENDIF
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java &UC4RB_SET_ENCODING_CMD# -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm Tokenizer "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ? "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? "&RUNID#" "&UC4RB_CUSTOMIZE_STRATEGY#" "&UC4RB_CUSTOMIZE_NAMESPACE#" ? "&UC4RB_CUSTOMIZE_BASEPATH#" ? "&UC4RB_CUSTOMIZE_REL_FILEPATH#" "&UC4RB_COMPONENT_NAME#" "&UC4RB_TARGET_NAME#" "&UC4RB_CUSTOMIZE_KEYVAL_SEP#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
